serviceDescription: Kickstart Delivery of ESXI Image for VIA-based ESXi Host Imaging
Kickstart Delivery of ESXI Image for VIA-based ESXi Host Imaging

1) All FQDNs/IP addresses for new entities to be created in a workflow are tested to ensure no response on those IP addresses before these entities are deployed. (e.g. vCenter Server, NSX Managers, NSX Edge Nodes, VCF Operations Fleet Manager, etc.) 2) All FQDNs/IP addresses for new entities to be created in a workflow are tested to ensure they are responsive and can be connected to after these entities are deployed. (e.g. vCenter Server, NSX Managers, NSX Edge Nodes, VCF Operations Fleet Manager, etc.) 3) All FQDNs/IP addresses for existing entities provided to SDDC Manager to consume or use are tested to ensure they are reachable. (e.g. ESXi Hosts, DNS / NTP, BGP Neighbors, etc.) 4) All gateways provided for networks assigned to entities are tested to ensure they respond to their assigned VLANs/networks. 5) Inter-gateway routing is tested to ensure the ability to route traffic.  6) Entities are tested to ensure inter-product connectivity. (e.g. ESXi Hosts to vSAN Witness, VCF Operations Fleet Manager to vCenter Server, etc.)
